name: collectionbuilder-demo-iiif-data
title: CollectionBuilder Demo IIIF Data
description: Metadata and data derived from CollectionBuilder Demo IIIF. CollectionBuilder-CSV featuring single- and multi-page IIIF objects displayed in Universal Viewer.

contributors.title: Center for Digital Inquiry and Learning (CDIL)

resources.title: CollectionBuilder Demo IIIF Metadata Facets
resources.description: Unique values and counts of metadata facet fields.

resources.description: Unique values and counts of metadata subject fields.

resources.description: Unique values and counts of metadata subject fields.

resources.name: geodata-json
